title: The Helper - Ai-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Phew-, Ai won, Ai won! That was so much fun-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ai-san.... Good work. Here’s a towel<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, thanks Rinari<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ai-san.... you’re amazing. I didn’t know you could play Lacrosse too. I don’t really understand the rules.... but you were cool<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai has only helped the lacrosse team a few times, though, Ai is not that good, you know? It’s just that the club members are all really good, so Ai was able to do that well. But Ai is lucky to be called cool by you, Rinari♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No matter what you do.... you’re always cool, Ai-san. No.... even without doing anything, you’re cool. I always think so. Rina-chan’s board「Resolute」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeh, you’re praising me too much! Or are you gonna ask for something from me after this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m not trying to do that.... but.... let’s ask anyway. I want to hear.... a pun<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Leave it to me! Ai made new ones~! “Kondoru ga Tobikondoru” “Eiyou toru to ee yo~” “Baku ga baku baku bakugui”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You’re always funny, Ai-san.... I like you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
